headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Latest updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Catch up on the latest buzz, trade alerts and league intel from our ESPN NBA insiders.

headlines.headline: NBA teams with most consecutive games at 100-plus points
headlines.description: The Denver Nuggets scored 100-plus points in 136 consecutive games in the 1980s. Check out other high-scoring teams throughout NBA history now.

headlines.headline: Fantasy basketball pickups: Look at Melton, Hield to fill Butler void

headlines.headline: Fires, destruction, hope: One year later for JJ Redick, the Lakers and L.A.
headlines.description: A year after fires burned across Los Angeles, Redick has become a public face of the rebuild and seen firsthand the generosity of those around him.

headlines.headline: Source: Grant Udinski withdraws from Browns' search, eyes Bills
headlines.description: Jaguars OC Grant Udinski has withdrawn from consideration for the Browns' head coaching position but is still pursuing the Bills' job, a source told ESPN.

headlines.headline: Stephen A.: Sam Darnold 'shut everybody up, especially me'
headlines.description: Stephen A. Smith gives Sam Darnold his flowers for beating the Los Angeles Rams and advancing to the Super Bowl.

headlines.headline: Seahawks open as favorites over Patriots for Super Bowl LX
headlines.description: The Seahawks are favored over the Patriots for Super Bowl LX, opening as a 3.5-point favorite before quickly jumping up to -4.5, according to DraftKings.

headlines.headline: Grant Udinski removes name from Browns' coach search
